widely known as the Red Baron, was a German fighter pilot with the Imperial 
German Army Air Service (Luftstreitkrfte) during the First World War. He is 
considered the ace-of-aces of the war, being officially credited with 80 ... 
Richthofen was shot down and killed near Amiens on 21 April 1918.
